timeline.message:
CLDR-13730 json: support unit preferences

- Also, move path transforms out to a separate file
- Other JSON code improvements
- give a warning if an input XML file results in no output
- grammatical features not included (commented out), blocked by CLDR-14272

CLDR-13730 json: support unit preferences

- Also, move path transforms out to a separate file
- Other JSON code improvements
- give a warning if an input XML file results in no output
- grammatical features not included (commented out), blocked by CLDR-14272

timeline.bodyText:
The grammaticalFeatures values are documented in https://unicode-org.github.io/cldr/ldml/tr35-general.html#Gender and beyond
The grammaticalDerivations values are documented in https://unicode-org.github.io/cldr/ldml/tr35-general.html#gender_compound_units and beyond.
If you think those need more information. please add that to https://unicode-org.atlassian.net/browse/CLDR-14272
timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -187,7 +213,15 @@
         "identity:language:type",
         "identity:script:type",
         "identity:territory:type",
-        "identity:variant:type");
+        "identity:variant:type"
+
+//        // TODO: Blocked by [CLDR-14272] - need more documentation
+//        "grammaticalFeatures:grammaticalGender:values",

timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -125,6 +141,15 @@
         // in common/supplemental/windowsZones.xml
         "mapTimezones:mapZone:other",
 
+        // in common/supplemental/units.xml
+        "*:unitPreference:geq",
+        "*:unitPreference:skeleton",
+
+//        // TODO: Blocked by [CLDR-14272] - need more documentation
+//        // in common/supplemental/grammaticalFeatures.xml
+//        "grammaticalDerivations:deriveComponent:value0",

replies.bodyText: those specific items are documented, yes. but the output file builds as a whole.
replies.author: srl295

timeline.author: macchiati
timeline.diffHunk:

         "weekData:weekendStart:territories",
         "weekData:weekendEnd:territories",

         "unitPreferenceDataData:unitPreferences:category",
